Articles.Content:
Hello, I am having an issue in my sandbox game saves. Everything was going fine in my science play through, then I hop on this morning and everytime I go to launch a craft it says the craft is either too tall, or too heavy for the launch pad. Now I'm in sandbox mode and everything is fully upgraded.

I had this issue yesterday but with the vab and sph but by switching back and forth between them it fixed the issue. Any help would be appreciated. I do have mods installed and I am running the newest version.

Hello and welcome to the forums! We'll need a bit more information to help you troubleshoot your issue. Please see the post below:

 

You'll need to include your KSP version, your player.log file, the list of mods you're using, and probably some screenshots as well to show us exactly what is happening.

Also, when you say:

23 hours ago, TheNamesTopher said:

I am having an issue in my sandbox game saves. Everything was going fine in my science play through, then I hop on this morning and everytime I go to launch a craft it says the craft is either too tall, or too heavy for the launch pad. Now I'm in sandbox mode and everything is fully upgraded.

Do you mean that the issue with the launchpad is occurring in sandbox saves or science saves?
Had this issue a month ago. Didn’t fix it. I instead started to play the career mode. Probably a mod issue, Can you list the mods that you have?
